text: Canevari is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Antonio Canevari (1681–1764), Italian architect * Cesare Canevari (1927-2012), Italian actor, director and screenwriter * Demetrio Canevari (1559-1625), Italian nobleman, son of Teramo Canevari * Ottaviano Canevari (1565-1639), Italian nobleman, son of Teramo Canevari * Paolo Canevari (born 1963), Italian contemporary artist * Teramo Canevari (1511-1592), Italian nobleman, father of Demetrio and Ottaviano Canevari Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Canevari
